actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

official_title: A bill to direct the Administrator of Veterans' Affairs to release a reverter interest of the United States in certain real property in Canandaigua, New York, previously conveyed by the United States to Sonnenberg Gardens, a nonprofit educational institution of the State of New York.

summary.text: Directs the Administrator of Veterans Affairs to release a reverter interest of the United States in certain real property in Canandaigua, New York, to a certain nonprofit educational institution.

titles.title: A bill to direct the Administrator of Veterans' Affairs to release a reverter interest of the United States in certain real property in Canandaigua, New York, previously conveyed by the United States to Sonnenberg Gardens, a nonprofit educational institution of the State of New York.
